annotations.description: Application template for JDV all-in-one example/demo

parameters.description: The name for the application.
parameters.name: APPLICATION_NAME

parameters.description: Custom hostname for http service route.  Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: <application-name>.<project>.<default-domain-suffix>
parameters.name: HOSTNAME_HTTP

parameters.description: Custom hostname for https service route.  Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: <application-name>.<project>.<default-domain-suffix>
parameters.name: HOSTNAME_HTTPS

parameters.description: List of directories from which VDBS will be copied into the deployment folder.  If unspecified, all archives in source will be copied.
parameters.name: VDB_DIRS

parameters.description: Database JNDI name used by application to resolve the datasource, e.g. java:/jboss/datasources/postgresql
parameters.name: DB_JNDI

parameters.description: Database name
parameters.name: DB_DATABASE

parameters.description: Sets xa-pool/min-pool-size for the configured datasource.
parameters.name: DB_MIN_POOL_SIZE

parameters.description: Sets xa-pool/max-pool-size for the configured datasource.
parameters.name: DB_MAX_POOL_SIZE

parameters.description: Sets transaction-isolation for the configured datasource.
parameters.name: DB_TX_ISOLATION

parameters.description: The maximum number of client connections allowed. This also sets the maximum number of prepared transactions.
parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_MAX_CONNECTIONS

parameters.description: Configures how much memory is dedicated to PostgreSQL for caching data.
parameters.name: POSTGRESQL_SHARED_BUFFERS

parameters.description: Database user name
parameters.name: DB_USERNAME

parameters.description: Database user password
parameters.name: DB_PASSWORD

parameters.description: HornetQ cluster admin password
parameters.name: JDV_HORNETQ_CLUSTER_PASSWORD

parameters.description: HornetQ cluster admin password
parameters.name: EAP_HORNETQ_CLUSTER_PASSWORD

parameters.description: GitHub trigger secret
parameters.name: GITHUB_WEBHOOK_SECRET

parameters.description: Generic build trigger secret
parameters.name: GENERIC_WEBHOOK_SECRET

parameters.description: Namespace in which the ImageStreams for Red Hat Middleware images are installed. These ImageStreams are normally installed in the openshift namespace. You should only need to modify this if you've installed the ImageStreams in a different namespace/project.
parameters.name: IMAGE_STREAM_NAMESPACE

parameters.description: JGroups cluster password
parameters.name: JDV_JGROUPS_CLUSTER_PASSWORD

parameters.description: JGroups cluster password
parameters.name: EAP_JGROUPS_CLUSTER_PASSWORD

parameters.description: Username for Teiid user
parameters.name: TEIID_USERNAME

parameters.description: Password for JDV TEIID_USERNAME
parameters.name: TEIID_PASSWORD

parameters.description: Username for ModeShape user
parameters.name: MODESHAPE_USERNAME

parameters.description: Password for JDV MODESHAPE_USERNAME
parameters.name: MODESHAPE_PASSWORD

parameters.description: Keystore file for jdbc secure transport
parameters.name: DATAVIRT_TRANSPORT_KEYSTORE

parameters.description: Alias for jdbc secure transport keystore
parameters.name: DATAVIRT_TRANSPORT_KEY_ALIAS

parameters.description: Password for jdbc secure transport keystore
parameters.name: DATAVIRT_TRANSPORT_KEYSTORE_PASSWORD

parameters.description: Authentication mode for secure transport (e.g. anonymous, 1-way)
parameters.name: DATAVIRT_TRANSPORT_AUTHENTICATION_MODE

parameters.description: Comma delimited list of usernames to add
parameters.name: DATAVIRT_USERS

parameters.description: Comma delimited list of passwords corresponding to DATAVIRT_USERS
parameters.name: DATAVIRT_USER_PASSWORDS

parameters.description: Comma delimited list of groups/roles corresponding to DATAVIRT_USERS
parameters.name: DATAVIRT_USER_GROUPS

parameters.description: SSO Service Location
parameters.name: SSO_SERVICE_URL

parameters.description: The SSO Client Secret for Confidential Access
parameters.name: SSO_SECRET

parameters.description: File path for keycloak.json configuration to load on start
parameters.name: SSO_IMPORT_FILE

parameters.description: If true SSL communication between EAP and the SSO Server will be insecure (i.e. certificate validation is disabled with curl)
parameters.name: SSO_DISABLE_SSL_CERTIFICATE_VALIDATION

parameters.description: Custom hostname for SSO http service route.  Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: <application-name>.<project>.<default-domain-suffix>
parameters.name: SSO_HOSTNAME_HTTP

parameters.description: Custom hostname for SSO https service route.  Leave blank for default hostname, e.g.: <application-name>.<project>.<default-domain-suffix>
parameters.name: SSO_HOSTNAME_HTTPS

parameters.description: The name of the secret containing the keystore file
parameters.name: HTTPS_SECRET

parameters.description: The name of the keystore file within the secret
parameters.name: HTTPS_KEYSTORE

parameters.description: The name associated with the server certificate
parameters.name: HTTPS_NAME

parameters.description: The password for the keystore and certificate
parameters.name: HTTPS_PASSWORD

parameters.description: JGroups cluster password
parameters.name: JGROUPS_CLUSTER_PASSWORD

annotations.description: Default secret file with name 'jboss' and password 'mykeystorepass'
Default secret file with name 'jboss' and password 'mykeystorepass'
Default secret file with name 'jboss' and password 'mykeystorepass'
Default secret file with name 'jboss' and password 'mykeystorepass'
Default secret file with name 'jboss' and password 'mykeystorepass'
The Teiid jdbc over ssl port.
